attributes.action: Force Crisis Pregnancy Centres to clearly disclose their anti-abortion stance
attributes.additional_details: Stop "Crisis Pregnancy Centres", such as Care Confidential and Life, from presenting themselves as legitimate "crisis pregnancy advisory services" when their aim is actually to persuade pregnant people against having abortions, often using false medical information to back up their claims. Their literature and counsellors should be forced to state clearly that they are neither abortion providers nor licensed medical practitioners.
